title: Researchers correct genetic mutation that causes IPEX, a life-threatening autoimmune syndrome

title_detail.value: Researchers correct genetic mutation that causes IPEX, a life-threatening autoimmune syndrome

summary: Researchers have created a method for modifying blood stem cells to reverse the genetic mutation that causes a life-threatening autoimmune syndrome called IPEX.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have created a method for modifying blood stem cells to reverse the genetic mutation that causes a life-threatening autoimmune syndrome called IPEX.
